search.query: | makeresults count=12 | streamstats count | eval name = CASE (count==1, "Human Resource", count==2, "Marketing", count==3, "Customer Support", count==4, "Sales", count==5, "Accounting", count==6, "Distribution", count==7, "Research and Development", count==8, "Management", count==9, "Production", count==10, "Operations", count==11, "Legal", count==12, "Purchasing") | eval count = random()%11 | stats sum(count) as count by name | eval truck_color = "#28383c" | eval cargo_color = CASE( count <=3, "#c23b35", 1==1, "#66c430" ) | `svg_viz_truck_one(count, cargo_color, truck_color )` | eval truck_one = svg_viz | `svg_viz_truck_ten_simple(count, cargo_color, truck_color)` | eval truck_ten = svg_viz | eval svg_viz = CASE( count <= 7, truck_ten, 1==1, truck_one )
